title: Carrot bubble bread
ingredients: ['375 g (13 oz) carrots', '400 g (14 oz) strong white (bread) flour', '2 tsp salt', '1 sachet easy-blend dried yeast', '125 ml (4½ fl oz) semi-skimmed milk', '1 tbsp extra virgin olive oil', 'about 150 g (5½ oz) strong wholemeal flour', '4 spring onions, very finely sliced', '1 egg, lightly beaten']
